channel.title: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]
channel.description:
Hi. Dama's here. And I'm looking for friends. More exactly, potential Game Master.
To those that doesn't know me, hi! I'm Dama, GMT+7, high school student, and most importantly here, an avid Roleplayer and Game Master.
To those that knows me, hi! You know who I am, so hi!
______ Let's move to the main point!
I like to roleplay. Since this forum has a Roleplay Section, of course, I want to roleplay!
But the amount of roleplay in this section can be counted by fingers. Thus, I decided to make my own roleplay to liven things up! You can all check [Godcard](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/godcard-roleplay-thread/30890), a modern fantasy roleplay that revolves around magical cards that grants ordinary humans magic from the past.
Godcard has been running for around two months now, and while it may look short, it's hard to maintain a roleplay for more than two weeks without dedicated players (Love you guys :blue_heart: ). To maintain a roleplay with an interesting story line and an array of interesting characters? Even harder!
...but I also want to roleplay.
My position in Godcard is not as a player, but a Game Master. I can't be the player. This is due to the nature of the roleplay, which requires me to be the mastermind of the plot.
That bring us to this thread!
I want to make a Sandbox Roleplay. Different from my plotted, story based roleplay, sandbox roleplay allows more freedom to the characters. Some people call it player driven roleplay, as the plot is progressed by the players, not a lone Game Master.
However!
I don't want the Sandbox Roleplay to die in just a few weeks because lack of things to do! That's why I'm looking for some players to establish the world with me (Yes, not help me but with me) and ensure the sandbox roleplay can go for a long time!
Tl;Dr, I want peeps to build a Sandbox Roleplay with. ____ ># Dama's Selfish Requirement for Game Master > >1. Mature. No, I don't want someone capable to be impartial all the time. I want someone that deal with conflict and not abuse power, rage quit, or ruin the fun for others because of a conflict >2. Active. Active in that you will try to create interaction, not wait until it comes. Heck, you can create an antisocial mute assassin *and still* create many meaningful interactions if you want. >3. Active Forum-ly. No need to get on daily, but know yourself. Who needs a GM that only active once in a blue moon? No one.
That's it! Oh, take note that Game Master here is more like Loremaker. It's a Sandbox. Once the world is established, Game Master only need to play like player and occassionally solve conflicts between players.
Now, who wants to make an RP? Whooo

item.title: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
The point of sandbox is for the players to be able to create a story of their own. Meaning, you can all create NPCs, add places and lores to build a plot of your own.

Read full topic
item.source: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]

item.title: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
Ayy

I love building stories, but I’m not used to worldbuilding at all!

I mean I can, but it’s hard. Why do you think Godcard is in New York.

Read full topic
item.source: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]

item.title: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]
item.dc:creator: AgentBoin
item.description:
just make sure there are appropriate storylines around and not just random dish dash because that’s how stories die sadly.

No this is not an application. But I’ll def RP and if you want to build a storyline with my character or have me take on a character for you (I’m totally up for that ) . I just hope its not full blown out sandbox because that could get boring I’d guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Dama the Cat is Looking for Friends [GM Interest Check]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
Hi.
Dama’s here. And I’m looking for friends.
More exactly, potential Game Master.

To those that doesn’t know me, hi! I’m Dama, GMT+7, high school student, and most importantly here, an avid Roleplayer and Game Master.

To those that knows me, hi! You know who I am, so hi!

Let’s move to the main point!

I like to roleplay. Since this forum has a Roleplay Section, of course, I want to roleplay!

But the amount of roleplay in this section can be counted by fingers. Thus, I decided to make my own roleplay to liven things up! You can all check Godcard, a modern fantasy roleplay that revolves around magical cards that grants ordinary humans magic from the past.

Godcard has been running for around two months now, and while it may look short, it’s hard to maintain a roleplay for more than two weeks without dedicated players (Love you guys ). To maintain a roleplay with an interesting story line and an array of interesting characters? Even harder!

…but I also want to roleplay.

My position in Godcard is not as a player, but a Game Master. I can’t be the player. This is due to the nature of the roleplay, which requires me to be the mastermind of the plot.

That bring us to this thread!

I want to make a Sandbox Roleplay. Different from my plotted, story based roleplay, sandbox roleplay allows more freedom to the characters. Some people call it player driven roleplay, as the plot is progressed by the players, not a lone Game Master.

However!

I don’t want the Sandbox Roleplay to die in just a few weeks because lack of things to do! That’s why I’m looking for some players to establish the world with me (Yes, not help me but with me) and ensure the sandbox roleplay can go for a long time!

Tl;Dr, I want peeps to build a Sandbox Roleplay with.

Dama’s Selfish Requirement for Game Master

  1. Mature. No, I don’t want someone capable to be impartial all the time. I want someone that deal with conflict and not abuse power, rage quit, or ruin the fun for others because of a conflict
  2. Active. Active in that you will try to create interaction, not wait until it comes. Heck, you can create an antisocial mute assassin and still create many meaningful interactions if you want.
  3. Active Forum-ly. No need to get on daily, but know yourself. Who needs a GM that only active once in a blue moon? No one.

That’s it! Oh, take note that Game Master here is more like Loremaker. It’s a Sandbox. Once the world is established, Game Master only need to play like player and occassionally solve conflicts between players.

Now, who wants to make an RP? Whooo

Read full topic
